metadata.name: Lilith
metadata.description:
Jewish folklore 
Lilith is an extremely controversial figure within the Jewish folklore,one of the controversial histories popularly told Lilith as first wife of Adam,in the midrashic text,she appeared severally, as a creation of God from dust,and was placed to be live in the garden of Eden until problem arose between Adam and Lilith when Adam tried to exercise dominant over Lilith,and she refused to lay beneath Adam during sex.she believed they were created equally from dust on earth.After Adam disagreed she fled. Lilith is said to be responsible for males erotic dreams and night emission. Lilith symbolizes female power,independence,sensuality, and despite all circumstances of her leaving the garden,Lilith is a symbol of power simply by her survival and mysteriousness. 

The art

Created in 230hrs
3 x 4ft dimensions 
Medium: pastel,charcoal,acrylics on chipboard 

The flower: Her feminity crown
The wings: power to be free
The chocolate:sexual appeal
Platform : dominance
